Package shef.mt.util

This package contains a set of convenience classes that are used throughout the project, as well as some independent scripts used for various data preparation tasks

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AlignCheck  
    ExtensionFilter  
    GizaFilter  
    GizaMerger
    Transforms a giza translation file where entries represent indeces in a vocabulary into a file where entries are represented by words
    Usage: wlv.mt.util.GizaMerger
    The last parameter, , is optional.
    Logger  
    NGramSorter
    Processes a language model file The result of this processing will be a new file containing at the top information about the cut-off frequencies in various portions of the language model, followed by those entries in the original file that have the frequency larger than a given threshold
    Pair
    A simple class that models a pair of String
    It provides equality operators based on keys and values
    PropertiesManager  
    StreamGobbler  

Package shef.mt.util Description

This package contains a set of convenience classes that are used throughout the project, as well as some independent scripts used for various data preparation tasks
